User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.7.5) Gecko/20041107 Firefox/1.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.7.5) Gecko/20041107 Firefox/1.0

this is the most israeli poplar site. the menu looks as block( half page) and
not as a line. when mouse is on menu. the menu selection should popup. it is not
happened

Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce:
1.enter www.ynet.co.il
2.enter in explorer www.ynet.co.il
3.see the diffrent

Actual Results:  
page looks diffrent

Expected Results:  
menue take half page and not open the menu items. the are in the list on the lef
side

comments.raw_text:
WFM on Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; de; rv:1.8b4) Gecko/20050908
Firefox/1.4 ID:2005090806

Please recheck this bug against a recent nightly build[1] to verify that the
behavior still exists and post the results here.

Also, please supply a testcase to help others verify this behavior.

Thanks.

[1] ftp://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/firefox/nightly/latest-mozilla1.8/
